text: Werther (Westf.) is a town in Gütersloh in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. About 11,000 people live there. Werther is in the Teutoburg Forest and is about northwest of Bielefeld. It is best known for its caramel candies called Werther's Original. == References == Category:Gütersloh Rural District
title: Werther, North Rhine-Westphalia
